comments: Winter Break OCS Program. ARTS 213 required prior Fall Term. Class fees may apply.
summary: This course is the second part of a two-term course sequence beginning with ARTS 213. The course begins with a two-week visit in December to New York City. Field-work will include daily drawing requirements and visits to the studios of working artists, museums, galleries and art performances. In regular weekly meetings during the winter term on campus, our experiences will be synthesized into a series of drawing projects that will be presented in an exhibit in The Weitz Center.
title: Elaborating on Perception: Drawing (Part 2, Field Investigation and Portfolio Development)
